backend/main.mo: Actor implementing challenge creation, user profiles, access control, recordings, chat, and invite link logic using multiple mixins and in-memory maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that lowercases assignment keys inside nested recordings maps while preserving other challenge fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for migration banner suppression and assignment canonicalization.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, components, hooks, screens, and i18n assets.
frontend/index.css: Imports and forwards the main global stylesheet from src/index.css.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the React app and specifying viewport and root mount container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controller handling auth state, URL-synced navigation, challenge status loading, invitation handling, and conditional screen rendering.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper component applying responsive container styling and invoking the migration banner suppression hook.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Renders multiline assignment text with bold 'Step X:' prefixes and preserved spacing.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Full-size authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with translated UI states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Icon-only authentication control showing login/logout icons and executing Internet Identity auth flow with cache reset.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Automatically checks for stored invitation parameters and redeems them, showing loading, success, or error UI states. Invalidates related challenge queries after successful redemption.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Provides a full chat interface for challenges including message sending, editing, replying, auto‑scrolling, and participant name resolution. Fetches messages with polling when active.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Displays a dismissible dialog informing users that a challenge was deleted. Uses translated text and a structured popup layout.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Renders a compact reference preview for a replied‑to chat message, resolving sender names via cached or fetched data. Falls back to a loading placeholder if the message isn't available yet.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer‑only panel showing auth state and principal and offering a button to refresh challenge status queries. Not enabled by default.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders two informational popups triggered by buttons, using translated content sections. Uses SharedPopup for consistent dialog behavior.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Renders a list of popup content sections with optional headings and pre‑wrapped text. Used for structured informational dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Blocks app content until the user provides a profile name, showing a form and saving via mutation. Loads existing profile data and handles validation and errors.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wraps a query and displays loading or error states with retry, rendering children only when data is ready. Standardizes UI for query‑dependent components.
frontend/src/components/RecordingFeedbac: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Consistent dialog wrapper that composes shadcn Dialog primitives with scrolling content and triggers. Standardizes popup size and behavior across the app.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Toggles light and dark themes using a button that switches icons based on current theme. Relies on a custom useTheme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Derives authentication state and principal string from the Internet Identity hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and related status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query keys and hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, challenge data, recordings, and chat messages using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuppressMigrationB: Hides a specific migration banner in the DOM and suppresses reappearances using a MutationObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme preference with localStorage and system fallback, providing a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Fetches the authenticated user's challenge status using the actor, with caching and retry behavior.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Implements a simple i18n provider with English translations and a lookup helper.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains the English translation dictionary with nested sections for app text and UI strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus global resets and layout settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Placeholder screen showing no active challenge, recovery UI, and navigation to create a new challenge.
Challenge creation and management placeholder handling dates, invitations, participants, and challenge lifecycle actions.
frontend/src/screens/Screen5ManageChalle: Empty file with no implemented content.
Simple placeholder showing challenge state info with optional navigation to edit mode.
Main in‑challenge screen handling assignments, recordings, tabs, participants, and challenge state recovery.
frontend/src/screens/UnifiedEntryMenu.ts: Entry menu determining login and navigation flow based on authentication and challenge status.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Utility for reading, writing, and clearing app state parameters in the URL without reloading.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed 7‑day challenge assignments with canonical IDs and detailed content.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears the active challenge ID in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats a challenge day into a readable header using start time and day index.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDeletedNotic: Manages a sessionStorage flag indicating a challenge-deleted notice should be shown.
frontend/src/utils/challengeRecovery.ts: Resets all challenge-related client state and invalidates relevant React Query caches.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random uppercase invitation codes without ambiguous characters.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, persists, and clears challenge invitation link parameters in URL and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Converts and validates day indices between UI (1–7) and backend (0–6) formats.
frontend/src/utils/recordingIds.ts: Normalizes recording day and assignment IDs to backend canonical forms and validates them.
Extracts, interprets, and maps backend errors to user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Retrieves, stores, persists, and clears URL parameters from query strings or hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom color system via CSS variables, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing schema versions, dapp summary, and a detailed list of implemented features with IDs, descriptions, and versions.
